title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: ICT Competency Development for 21st-Century Teachers: Mathematics Subject Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core ICT competencies based on the ICT-CFT framework and apply them to math instruction.
In an LMS environment, it is possible to produce educational materials (quizzes, videos, images) using only mobile devices
Based on learner analysis, three or more criteria can be presented for selecting digital tools for visualizing mathematical concepts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
